name: Cape Sienna Hotel & Villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice decor with modern clean lines. As explained by the receptionist, all rooms have a sea view, which is a nice touch. Rooms are spacious with a nice balcony and sofa. Food decent, could have done with more authentic thai food as well as less mosquitoes during breakfast, but understand it's the tropics.
reviews.title: Great potential for Cape Sienna

description: Cape Sienna is a new chic modern resort that brings sophisticated style of city living to the tropical beauty of Phuket. Designed as a retreat for the urbane cosmopolitan, the sleek accommodations and restaurants are all positioned to command stunning sea views from a dramatic west coast headland.
